thread.section_title: Kyriad Paris 10 - Canal Saint Martin - Republique - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good
thread.title_full: Good - Review of Kyriad Paris 10 - Canal Saint Martin - Republique, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Susan M
title: Good
text: We stayed here for 3 nights in march 2017, we found the hotel to be very good, friendly helpful staff at reception, very handy for the train station, canal st martin is lovely with great bars and restaurants, it took us 30 mins to walk to the Louvre. The room was small but had everything we needed, very cosy with a great shower.
